name: Ehsan Bakhtari
story: Ehsan Bakhtari was born in Tehran, Iran. Growing up, he had always wanted to serve in the military to make his country proud. He joined the Iranian military as soon as he was of age and excelled in his training. Ehsan was chosen to be a part of the Iranian special forces and quickly became an Assistant Missile Specialist. Due to the political unrest in his country, Ehsan had to flee to Altis Island where he joined the OPFOR forces to continue serving his country.
